showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:41}); // {Cloud}
“Which would you have asked?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // {Aeris}
“……first off,
it bothered me how you
looked exactly alike.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // {Aeris}
“Two completely different people,
but look exactly the same.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Aeris}
“The way you walk, gesture…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // {Aeris}
“I think I must have seen him again, in you…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:38}); // {Barret}
“Hey spike-head.
What'd you wanna see fireworks with me for?”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“Ok, I'm going to just
go ahead and say it…”

{Tifa}
“{Aeris} would be able to just
come out and say it, probably.”

{Aeris}
“……first off,
it bothered me how you
looked exactly alike.”

{Aeris}
“Two completely different people,
but look exactly the same.”

{Aeris}
“I think I must have seen him again, in you…”

{Aeris}
I know, I know…what I mean is…

{Barret}
“Hey spike-head.
What'd you wanna see fireworks with me for?”

{Barret}
“Oh man, there just ain't no choice!”

{Barret}
“What the hell's that supposed to mean?”

{Barret}
“There ain't no way I'm lettin' a wacko like you
anywhere near my little Marlene!”

{Barret}
“Wish I could've brought Marlene here.
She'd love the fireworks.”

{Barret}
“Why the hell do I gotta be
here with a jackass like you!”

{Barret}
“…The more I think
'bout it the madder I get!”

{Yuffie}
“H, hey!!
Say something, why don't you!”
